text:
="preserve">Susan Coxe Hendl (September 18, 1947 – October 12, 2020) was an American ballet dancer and "répétiteur". She danced with the New York City Ballet between 1963 and 1983. Hendl was born in New York City.
Hendl died from renal failure on October 12, 2020 in New York City. She was 73.
